short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offline Project & Tasks Manager allow freelancers to :Track their time , Organize tasks in a kanban board,Create invoices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Offline time tracking & management  extension allow freelancers to 
- Track their time 
- Organize tasks in a drag & drop kanban board 
- Create and print invoices .
- Sync Project using Chrome storage sync API
- Calculate Paypal Fee 
- Generate Paypal Pay Me Link
